title: Need team mates for bilgewater events?? Look here
body:
Hey all. Im creating this thread so people who dont have a team can advertise themselves on here and teams can find new players. 
I dont really know much about it so I'll just say that I main Ahri{{champion:103}}  mid, Nami{{champion:267}}  and Leo{{champion:89}}  supp, Cait{{champion:51}}  and MF{{champion:21}}  adc, Cho{{champion:31}}  top and whoever I feel like jgling with {{champion:254}} {{champion:5}} {{champion:57}} {{champion:32}}  xD
Just looking for some fun doe c:
